title: Interested in a Discord centered around LoL events?
body:
Hey everybody,
I am Zach - one of few Owners of the No Sleep Palace Discord server. Basically, the point of this post is to grow our community (of course) and enable us to run weekly or fortnightly LoL events (likely 1v1 tournaments) with members. We warmly welcome all players of all demographics and ranks whether you're Iron IV or at the peak of Challenger! If you're interested in these events, feel free to come down and show your support and interest! If you're keen to join the No Sleep Palace, the link to the Discord is below.
Thank you everyone!

Discord: https://discord.gg/weQZCaT
